SEARCH
Module LB08
Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller

Class ClientMessageGenerator

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.controller.ClientMessageGenerator
public class ClientMessageGenerator extends Object
This class is responsible for generating JSON messages that are sent to server throughout the game.

  • Method Details

    • generateSetUsernameMessage

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject generateSetUsernameMessage(String username)
      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server for setting the player's username.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to be set for the player.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "setUsername" message.

    • generateSetUpGameMessage

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject generateSetUpGameMessage(String gameName, int numOfPlayers)
      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server to set up a new game.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The desired name for the new game.
      numOfPlayers - The desired number of players for the game.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "setUp" message.

    • generateJoinGameMessage

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject generateJoinGameMessage(String gameName)
      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server to join a specific game.
      Parameters:
      gameName - The name of the game to join.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "join" message.

      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server indicating the client is ready to begin the game.

      The JSONObject representing the "ready" message.

    • generateChosenStarterCardSideMessage

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject generateChosenStarterCardSideMessage(int cardId, boolean facingUp)
      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server with the chosen side for the starter card.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The unique identifier of the starter card.
      facingUp - Whether the chosen side of the card is facing up. True if the front is selected, false otherwise.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "starterCard" message.

    • generateChosenSecretObjectiveMessage

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject generateChosenSecretObjectiveMessage(int id)
      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server indicating the chosen secret objective card.
      Parameters:
      id - The unique identifier of the chosen secret objective card.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "objectiveCard" message.

    • generatePlaceMessage

      public static org.json.simple.JSONObject generatePlaceMessage(int cardId, int x, int y, boolean facingUp)
      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server for placing a card on the game board.
      Parameters:
      cardId - The unique identifier of the card to be placed.
      x - The X-coordinate of the desired placement location.
      y - The Y-coordinate of the desired placement location.
      facingUp - Whether the card should be placed facing up or down.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "place" message.

    • generateDirectDrawResourceCardMessage

      Generates a JSON message object to be sent to the server requesting to draw a resource card directly from the resource deck.
      Returns:
      The JSONObject representing the "directDrawResourceCard" message.
